text: A Nest of Noblemen () is a 1914 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vladimir Gardin.Российская национальная библиотека в Петербурге представит на выставке рукописи Тургенева It stars Olga Preobrazhenskaya, Lyudmila Sychova, and Mikhail Tamarov. This movie is a film adaptation of the eponymous novel by Ivan Turgenev. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Gardin Category:1914 drama movies
title: A Nest of Noblemen
